text: was a Japanese actor. He won two Japanese Academy Awards for best actor, for The Silk Road (1988) and Tsuribaka Nisshi 6 (1993). Nishida was born in Koriyama, Japan. Nishida also won the Blue Ribbon Award for Best Actor for Get Up! and Tsuribaka Nisshi 14 (2003). He was best known for his role as Pigsy (Cho Hakkai) in Monkey. He received the Order of the Rising Sun in 2018. Nishida was found dead in his home in Setagaya, Tokyo on October 17, 2024, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website (in Japanese) Category:1947 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
